It will upload your current local bookmark and settings. Continue? None Network Log Permission denied. Set it in settings now? Via needs the following permissions to work.

 Storage: for downloading files from the browser and importing/exporting bookmarks etc.

 Location: for sites like Google Maps, it is disabled by default in settings and displays a pop-up asking if a site may use your location when it is enabled.

 Phone: for getting your non-privacy Android device info to do simple statistics and collect error exception when FC.
